Key Match Events: Alex Verdugo hit a walk-off grand slam in the ninth inning
Aaron Judge hit a single to left field, scoring Gleyber Torres and advancing Juan Soto to second base
Salvador Perez hit a home run in the third inning
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
The coach highlighted the victory as a pivotal moment in their playoff push
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game went into 15 innings before a decisive home run by Mike Trout
Weather conditions did not significantly impact the game
Others: Brady Singer faced 4 batters in the 7th inning
James McArthur pitched a perfect game with 20 strikeouts
